last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 14
last_episode_to_air.overview: J commits another evil act after escaping, and Bit-na is dragged to Hell. Will this be the end?

name: The Judge from Hell
overview: A cruel and vicious judge who wields power only for herself, who meets a warm and cheerful detective who puts the victims first.

seasons.name: Limited Series
seasons.overview: Kang Bit-na, a judge possessed by a demon, meets Detective Han Da-on and starts punishing criminals.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Demon Justitia possesses the body of Judge Kang Bit-na and must punish criminals.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Da-on receives unexpected news while protecting Min-jeong. Bitn-a's first infernal trial begins.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: While reveling in her string of executions, Bit-na encounters someone unexpected.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Bit-na’s infernal trial begins once again for Bae Jayeong’s misdeeds. “Bad adults must be punished.”

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: While trailing Bi-tna, Da-on finds himself at a secret demons’ meeting. A horrific incident occurs.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: “Why do you keep interfering?” Will Bit-na escape Da-on and conclude her infernal trial?

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: So-young suspects serial killer J is back. Meanwhile, Da-on remains suspicious about Bit-na’s identity.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: So-young disappears. Bit-na worries for Da-on but concludes Choi Won-joong’s infernal trial as a demon.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Da-on vows revenge against serial killer J and joins forces with demon Bit-na.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Detective J’s true identity is uncovered. Bit-na encounters emotions she’s never wanted to face.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Bit-na loses her powers for breaking the rules but still heads to Jae-geol’s home to uncover J.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A body is found in a burned car, and the truth is revealed. Who is J?

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Finally, J’s trial begins. At a crossroads, Bit-na must make a life-or-death choice.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: J commits another evil act after escaping, and Bit-na is dragged to Hell. Will this be the end?

1.name: Limited Series
1.overview: Kang Bit-na, a judge possessed by a demon, meets Detective Han Da-on and starts punishing criminals.
